system.description: Starting at 9th level, you add your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1) to damage when making an attack using two weapon fighting. Additionally, you can use your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.d8k1x28y4vn6h3q5]{Cunning Action} to draw and throw, or pick up and throw, a weapon or improvised weapon.
